If you're in the mood for something a bit more lighthearted, "Johns" could be up your alley! It's a quirky comedy that delves into the lives of two male prostitutes trying to make ends meet on Santa Monica Blvd. With a talented cast, including Terrence Howard and Elliott Gould, it's a fun ride!
